attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The  wildwalk and imax theatre, part of the attraction @bristol is due to close because of lack of funding, the goverment is always moaning about not enough  children are getting interested in science and here we have an attaction dedicated to it yet it cannot get any  long tern funding from the goverment or any other source, talk about calling the kettle black, these are the sort of places that should be kept open, In this day and age when they just about fund anything thats going in this country yet not a centre like this. I think its a disgrace, if you agree please sign the petition the sooner the better as we only have around three weeks to prove a point,
      thankyou
         R Stott  C Stott

rejection.details: Sorry, each petition must have a proper title - you have used your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
